name: Cheap Block Theatre
description:
Puzzle Platformer with financial insufficiencies.

The premise of this game is that you are playing in a very small theatre with close to no funds. Therefore they only have one of each prop. It is not very long but i hope you enjoy it none the less. Have fun!

Part of the GMTK Game Jam 2019

Controlls:
Move - A/D
Jump - W
Pick up Item - E
Drop Item - Q
Throw Item - E
